‘Nanny state’: Council proposes fizzy drink ban at sports stadium https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nanny-state-council-proposes-fizzy-drink-ban-at-sports-spadium/nh7a6xorf5c6hjvngqypnbgb74/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nanny-state-council-proposes-fizzy-drink-ban-at-sports-spadium/nh7a6xorf5c6hjvngqypnbgb74/ Neil ReidCouncil claims fizzy ban at sports ground could improve the health of locals and visitors. Sat, 01 Feb 2025 16:00:00 +0000 Health officials back a council bid to ban some fizzy and sugary drinks from Central Energy Trust Arena, but it is a move some residents have hit out including one who has labelled it a step towards a "nanny state". Photo / Supplied
